tags: bras and voldemort share the same category
summary: I still get a kick out of bras once being called “unmentionables” like, a slip of cotton gets two cups and suddenly it’s...
body:
I still get a kick out of bras once being called “unmentionables” like, a slip of cotton gets two cups and suddenly it’s Voldemort and we dare not speak it’s name! 😂 😂

And lets face it, bras can be the enemy, especially when we’re shopping for them! 😆

blog.name: bitingdownpromo
blog.title: Biting Down
blog.description: The year is 2027. The wizarding community is tearing itself apart as danger lurks around every corner; the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power. Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance?

summary:
the electronics of your heart...
 The year is 2028. After an incendiary article from Rita Skeeter reporting an increase in...
caption:
the electronics of your heart…

The year is 2028. After an incendiary article from Rita Skeeter reporting an increase in squib births, the wizarding world is tossed into chaos concerning the loss of magical heritage. The renegades vow to protect what’s left of magical blood without caring about the damage along the way. More and more wixen go missing, including the Weasleys’ own Dominique. The Ministry fights within itself as Percy Weasley and Hermione Granger battle for the position of Minister of Magic, tearing the fabric holding wizarding society together.

see how fast they fall apart…

Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance? Whether you flee or bite down and take the heat, the next great war is coming and the outcome is up to you. Welcome to Biting Down.

home | plot | rules | wanted connections | character suggestions | application

tags: IF YOU DON'T AGREE THEN JUST IGNORE
summary: This is about Albus Dumbledore. If you don’t agree, feel free to ignore this post.
title: This is about Albus Dumbledore. If you don’t agree, feel free to ignore this post.
body:
A lot of people complain about Albus Dumbledore. A lot. They always make him out to be over-the-top manipulative, sinister, Mary-Shaw level of control freak, and is constantly written out to be someone like Palpatine who governs the world and does not-so-ok things with it.

Oh, I get, I really do. For the most of the books, Albus Dumbledore is a Mentor character, guiding and giving advice to Harry and everyone else. Most of his advice sounds good, with the fear-of-the-name quote being the most known. But then after OotP where he just ups and avoids Harry like he doesn’t know this lonely boy looks up to him, all the way to when he died and it is revealed that he’d been preparing Harry to die, everyone seemed to just Hate Albus Dumbledore. He is portrayed as a puppet-master, someone who thinks his way is the only way and everyone else’s way isn’t good enough. I’ve seen fics that bash him so hard his death is written in a dark, sadistic way, or even diminishes his whole character by dying in a stupid way like choking on a lemon drop.

When I click the tag for Good Albus Dumbledore, I can see 145 fics in total. That’s in Ao3. Where the number of Harry Potter fics stand at more than 190,000.

So where exactly am I going?

It’s this: Harry Potter named his second son Albus. 

This is after he knew Dumbledore set him up to die. After Dumbledore deliberately avoided him when his scar was acting up in fifth year. After he was used to gain the agreement of Slughorn to be a potions professor. After all the shit that Harry went up against that was at least partly planned to help strengthen him for the battle with Voldemort. After knowing all of that, Albus Dumbledore was the one that he saw when he “died” in the Forbidden Forest. Harry named his son after him. 

Yes, there are a hundred thousand things he could have done better. But why am I not seeing these fics? 

Severus Snape gets leeway because he did everything for Lily, or at least her memory. Is that it?

Draco Malfoy was a boy who was raised in a family with skewed ideals. Is that it?

Slytherin House values ambition and cunning, and those traits aren’t necessarily bad. Is that it?

Why can’t I see fics that explore Albus Dumbledore not as an evil overlord but as a genuine human being? He had his flaws, but he also had his good points. There aren’t enough fics that explore him in depth like they did with literally every other character in the HP Universe. I mean, even VOLDEMORT’s character got scrutinized, down to every action and every gesture, canon and otherwise. I don’t mean excusing him of everything he did wrong. Just that we, as a fandom, should stop treating Dumbledore as a convenient character to hate every time we write a fic. It’s time we stop demonizing Albus Dumbledore.

summary: William Nott - OPEN  Faction: Death Eaters War is messy, something that William Nott has always hated. Despite agreeing with...
caption:
William Nott - OPEN
Faction: Death Eaters

War is messy, something that William Nott has always hated. Despite agreeing with their views, joining the Death Eaters has never been something he’s really wanted. It is too dangerous, too unclean. But pressures from his Pureblood family pushed him to take the Dark Mark and though he fears where it will lead him, he’s taken to Lord Voldemort’s cause with the same cleverness and eloquence that he applies to everything in his life.

Nott is not just a Death Eater, he’s a writer, a creator of stories, but the one that must be told now is his own. Will you be the one to write it?

-

CRIMSON BEGINNING - A psychological horror Harry Potter roleplay

For the intrepid and curious we offer:

  • Highly literate, and para-centric role-play
  • Dark and complicated themes (these plots are not for the faint of heart)
  • A steady paced, active, and fun-filled environment
  • A safe place to brainstorm or bounce ideas

Home || Rules || Apply || Navigation || FAQs

CRIMSON BEGINNING - A psychological horror Harry Potter roleplay

For the intrepid and curious we offer:

  • Highly literate, and para-centric role-play
  • Dark and complicated themes (these plots are not for the faint of heart)
  • A steady paced, active, and fun-filled environment
  • A safe place to brainstorm or bounce ideas

Home || Rules || Apply || Navigation || FAQs
trail.content:
William Nott - OPEN
Faction: Death Eaters

War is messy, something that William Nott has always hated. Despite agreeing with their views, joining the Death Eaters has never been something he’s really wanted. It is too dangerous, too unclean. But pressures from his Pureblood family pushed him to take the Dark Mark and though he fears where it will lead him, he’s taken to Lord Voldemort’s cause with the same cleverness and eloquence that he applies to everything in his life.

Nott is not just a Death Eater, he’s a writer, a creator of stories, but the one that must be told now is his own. Will you be the one to write it?

-

CRIMSON BEGINNING - A psychological horror Harry Potter roleplay

For the intrepid and curious we offer:

  • Highly literate, and para-centric role-play
  • Dark and complicated themes (these plots are not for the faint of heart)
  • A steady paced, active, and fun-filled environment
  • A safe place to brainstorm or bounce ideas

Home || Rules || Apply || Navigation || FAQs

blog.name: bitingdownpromo
blog.title: Biting Down
blog.description: The year is 2027. The wizarding community is tearing itself apart as danger lurks around every corner; the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power. Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance?

summary:
the electronics of your heart...
 The year is 2028. After an incendiary article from Rita Skeeter reporting an increase in...
caption:
the electronics of your heart…

The year is 2028. After an incendiary article from Rita Skeeter reporting an increase in squib births, the wizarding world is tossed into chaos concerning the loss of magical heritage. The renegades vow to protect what’s left of magical blood without caring about the damage along the way. More and more wixen go missing, including the Weasleys’ own Dominique. The Ministry fights within itself as Percy Weasley and Hermione Granger battle for the position of Minister of Magic, tearing the fabric holding wizarding society together.

see how fast they fall apart…

Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance? Whether you flee or bite down and take the heat, the next great war is coming and the outcome is up to you. Welcome to Biting Down.

home | plot | rules | wanted connections | character suggestions | application
